about_the_game:
Game Overview

A young man in his twenties disappears without a trace in the town of Evercrest. All the people in the small town are worried and scared because a new scenario of missing people is happening every day. The missing guy's best friend, an aspiring journalist, is shocked and doesn't know how to react, he wants a mission to find out what is happening to all the missing people. He gets an invitation from his boss to interview a very popular scientist and doctor in town so they can gain popularity and spread the word about his new inventions. But not everything goes according to plan...

Gameplay

• First-Person
Players will experience the game through the eyes of one character in first-person perspective.
• Third-Person
While also occasionally viewing them from a dynamic third-person angle.
• Quick-Time Events
Quick-time events demand rapid player responses to on-screen cues, shaping crucial moments. They'll involve button presses.
Different Choices
Players will face many decisions, altering their path and shaping outcomes. With each choice, they'll navigate divergent storylines, facing varied challenges and experiencing unique consequences, ensuring a dynamic and personalized gameplay experience.
